content.text: Well, the activities in my new job have been fun. I have been working at an amusement park and I have been dressing up as different famous characters during my time here. I think of myself as a happy employee; the salary is not bad and I rarely make overtime. I get to laugh a lot and I have been meeting new people. As well, my boss is really cool. She lets us be creative and expressive about new ideas that could improve our visitors' experiences. Of course, I would like to have a different occupation once I get older, but for now, this is a good way to earn a living.
